agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Insurance TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 26, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Eddie Lucio III HB 698 Blanco Relating to certain protected practices of pharmacists and pharmacies regarding amounts charged for prescription drugs. HB 1757 Lucio III Relating to the authority of an insured to select a pharmacist under the insured's health insurance policy. HB 2817 Lucio III | et al. Relating to the contractual relationship between a pharmacist or pharmacy and a health benefit plan issuer or pharmacy benefit manager. HB 3441 Lucio III Relating to reimbursement under certain health benefit plans for certain services and procedures performed by pharmacists. HB 1455 Hunter | et al. Relating to the audit of wholesale invoices during certain audits of pharmacists and pharmacies. HB 1905 Klick Relating to the relationship between physicians or health care providers and health maintenance organizations or preferred provider benefit plans. HB 2099 Lambert | et al. Relating to modification of certain prescription drug benefits and coverage offered by certain health benefit plans. HB 3299 Lucio III Relating to the applicability of mediation requirements for balance billing to certain health benefit plans. HB 1742 Smithee Relating to the mediation of the settlement of certain health benefit claims involving balance billing by out-of-network laboratories. HB 1718 Muñoz, Jr. Relating to participation in the health care market by managed care plan enrollees. HB 1832 Johnson, Julie | et al. Relating to prohibited practices relating to health benefit plan coverage for emergency care. HB 2630 Johnson, Julie Relating to physician and health care provider directories for certain health benefit plans. HB 1306 Frullo Relating to the provision of flood coverage under insurance policies issued by surplus lines insurers. HB 2587 Lucio III Relating to the business of travel insurance. HB 1251 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to financially impaired fraternal benefit societies. HB 2408 Johnson, Julie Relating to preauthorization by certain health benefit plan issuers of certain benefits. HB 2520 Johnson, Julie Relating to disclosures by certain health benefit plans to enrollees regarding certain preauthorized medical care and health care services. HB 2327 Bonnen, Greg Relating to preauthorization of certain medical care and health care services by certain health benefit plan issuers. HB 2387 Bonnen, Greg Relating to the regulation of utilization review and independent review for health benefit plan coverage. HB 1273 Zedler Relating to denial of payment for preauthorized health care services. HB 3041 Turner, Chris Relating to the renewal of a preauthorization for a medical or health care service. HB 1411 Lucio III Relating to the cancellation and nonrenewal of certain liability and commercial property insurance policies. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 2967 HB 3933 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
